thread.title: 1 night stau
thread.title_full: 1 night stau - Review of Eiffel Rive Gauche, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BKB47
title: 1 night stau
text: This hotel is small and has a boutique feel to it. It depends what you want it for, I rate 4/5 for location and we didn't spend long here but if I was rating the room itself it would be average as it is teeny tiny! Essentially we were just after a bed for the night so it didn't matter too much however there isn't much room for your things. The bathroom was small but shower worked fine, a heater was provided in the room and reception staff were friendly. And of course the location is perfect for a visit to the Eiffel Tower!
